content: a court in modena has issued a final ruling on a case involving the dissolution of a real estate community the court declared the dissolution and assigned specific properties to each party involved the plaintiffs were ordered to pay a sum of money to one of the parties the remaining real estate was divided into three lots with each party being assigned ownership of a specific lot the court considered relevant laws and previous court decisions to support its ruling the court also addressed the construction of a garage and the need for construction works to facilitate the division the costs of the case and the courtappointed expert were to be shared equally by the parties the ruling dismisses any remaining claims and compensates the parties for the litigation costs
